Row.Text: +3 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS]Happiness. Adds Food for each adjacent Resource. Can only be placed on Rough Terrain.

+2 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION]Production. Adds Happiness to each Mined Resource assigned to the city. Can only be placed on Rough Terrain.
